and <S%G2532><s%> had <S%G1492>seen<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3101>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2068>ate<s%> their <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G5495>with<s%> <S%G2839>defiled<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, <S%G449>unwashen<s%>, <S%G5495>hands<s%>.

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> his <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G3739>That<s%> <S%G1437>wherewith<s%> thou mightest have been <S%G5623>profited<s%> <S%G3739>by<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> is <S%G2878>Corban<s%>, <S%G3739>that<s%> is to <S%G2076>say<s%>, Given to <S%G1435>God<s%>;

ye <S%G2532><s%> no <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G863>suffer<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>aught<s%> <S%G3962>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>;

making <S%G208><s%> <S%G208>void<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> by <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3862>tradition<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> ye have <S%G3860>delivered<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> like <S%G3946>things<s%> ye <S%G4160>do<s%>.

there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> from <S%G1855>without<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1531>going<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> the things which proceed <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G846>man<s%> are <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2076>that<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%>.

because <S%G3754><s%> it <S%G1531>goeth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2836>belly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> goeth <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G856>draught<s%>? This he <S%G2511>said<s%>, making <S%G3956>all<s%> meats <S%G1033>clean<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> from <S%G2081>within<s%>, <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%>, <S%G4202>fornications<s%>, <S%G2829>thefts<s%>, <S%G5408>murders<s%>, <S%G3430>adulteries<s%>,

all <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> evil <S%G4190>things<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> from <S%G2081>within<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> she <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3483>Yea<s%>, <S%G2532>Lord<s%>; <S%G1063>even<s%> the <S%G2952>dogs<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G5132>table<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G3813>children<s%>'s <S%G5589>crumbs<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G5342>bring<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> one that was <S%G2974>deaf<s%>, and had an impediment in his <S%G3424>speech<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2007>lay<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2007>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> looking <S%G308>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, he <S%G4727>sighed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2188>Ephphatha<s%>, <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, Be <S%G1272>opened<s%>.

And2532, 2112 <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G189>ears<s%> were <S%G1272>opened<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1199>bond<s%> <S%G1100>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> was <S%G3089>loosed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G3723>plain<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G1291>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G2036>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G3745>more<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1291>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, so much the <S%G3123>more<s%> a great <S%G4054>deal<s%> they published <S%G2784>it<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1605>were<s%> beyond <S%G5249>measure<s%> <S%G1605>astonished<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, He hath <S%G4160>done<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%>; he <S%G4160>maketh<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G2974>deaf<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G216>dumb<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%>.
